address: Thị trấn Mường Giàng, Huyện Quỳnh Nhai, Tỉnh Sơn La
thought:
**Analysis of Administrative Unit Mapping**

Okay, so I'm dealing with an address: "Thị trấn Mường Giàng, Huyện Quỳnh Nhai, Tỉnh Sơn La".  First things first, I need to break down the old administrative units.  I've got "Thị trấn Mường Giàng" as the old ward, "Huyện Quỳnh Nhai" as the old district (though that's less critical, given the task description), and "Tỉnh Sơn La" as the old province.

Now, the province is a straightforward one. I consulted the Provincial Resolutions (specifically 60-NQ/TW) and confirmed that "Tỉnh Sơn La" is not undergoing any mergers. It remains "Tỉnh Sơn La."

Next, I zeroed in on the resolutions that are likely to be relevant. Resolution 1681/NQ-UBTVQH15, concerning administrative unit restructuring in Sơn La province, is a key piece of information. Line 8 of this resolution clearly states the merger of "thị trấn Mường Giàng" with other areas into a new entity called "xã Quỳnh Nhai."  This is exactly what I was looking for.

I've also got the new ward data on hand, which confirms "Xã Quỳnh Nhai" with a code "03703".  The new data aligns perfectly with the resolution.

Finally, I'm ready to construct the JSON output, which should reflect the mapping from the old units to the new units. The new province is "Tỉnh Sơn La". The new ward name is "Xã Quỳnh Nhai", and the ward code is "03703".  The citation will point directly to the relevant resolution, 1681/NQ-UBTVQH15, Line 8, because it explicitly deals with the merging of the old units. Because the new unit matches exactly what the resolution says and the data I have, the confidence level will be set to "high."

This should map the old administrative information to the new units based on my research and data.

citation.header: 1681/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Sơn La
citation.line: 8. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của thị trấn Mường Giàng và các xã Chiềng Bằng, Chiềng Khoang, Chiềng Ơn thành xã mới có tên gọi là xã Quỳnh Nhai.
